name: Off the Ringer
description:
The phones never stop ringing! Reconnect callers with their lost objects in this mini Swiss design-inspired puzzle game.

How to Play

This game is mouse only. Click and hold a phone to answer a call and listen for clues for which object belongs to which caller. Use the buttons to navigate between the phone room and the lost and found room. Click and drag the correct object to each of the 5 outboxes, then click "Send Objects" to check your answers.

Credits

Made for Global Game Jam 2021 with RVA Game Jams & The Sheep's Meow

Programming: El Tucker (pastelpink.games)
Art: Ruthie Edwards (@ruthie_edwards)
Sound: Tommaso Annoni (@tomannoni_music)
